name: Dwagon
description:
Controls:

A Controller Is Recommended!

controller:

  • Left Stick To Move Right/Left
  • A/Cross to Jump
  • X/Square and Left Stick to Aim and Attack
  • RT/R2 to Dash
  • Start/Options to Pause/Unpause
  • B/Circle to go back

keyboard:

  • W and D Arrow keys To Move Right/Left
  • Space To Jump
  • W,A,S,D and Left Mouse Click to Aim and Attack
  • Right Mouse Click to Dash
  • Tab to Pause/UnPuase
  • Q to go back
